Index.title: Reliable Service Every Time
Index.subTitle: QuickShip, the epitome of efficiency in the realm of international courier services, stands as a beacon for swift and reliable parcel deliveries across borders.

Works.heading: How We Deliver Your Parcel
Works.Parcel Register description: Essential component for tracking and managing shipment details effectively.
Works.Parcel Loading description: Integral for efficiently handling goods onto transportation vehicles.
Works.Parcel In-transit description: Essential stage ensuring smooth transition within logistics network.
Works.Parcel Delivery description: Final step ensuring timely delivery for satisfied customers.

Service.title: Our Relevant Services
Service.Parcel Delivery description: First-mile pickup, last-mile delivery services for individuals (C2C), small businesses (B2C) and corporates (B2B).
Service.Bulk Shipment description: Specialized solutions for large items and large numbers.
Service.Customized Solutions description: Tailor made solutions for your unique business needs.
Service.Line Haul description: Freight movement solutions including FTL (full truckload), LTL (less than truckload).
Service.Load/Unload description: Industry-specific loading/unloading services in factories, project sites, and ports.
Service.Logistics as a service description: Outsource logistics requirements, get a dedicated team for your company.
Service.Truck Rent description: Open trucks and covered vans for rent any size, anywhere in BD.
Service.Warehouse description: Complete fulfillment solutions including storing, sorting, processing.

Area.text: Quick Ship provides logistics support in all 64 districts and 493 sub districts across Bangladesh and also entire World.
Area.subText: Whatever your logistics need, we guarantee the fastest service all over the country.
